column1: 1125|twenty-five past eleven|At 10.15 Arlena departed from her rondezvous
column2: a minute or two later Patrick Redfern came down and registered surprise
column4: etc. Christine's task was easy enough. Keeping her own watch concealed
column5: she asked Linda at twenty-five past eleven what time it was. Linda looked at her watch and replied that it was a quarter to twelve.

column3: Katharina Blum was finally taken from her apartment for questioning
column4: it was decided not to handcuff her at all.
